function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of heterogeneity in meta-analyses results","Impact":"Uncertainty in the association between greenspace exposure and health benefits","Mitigation":"Conduct more rigorous studies to improve the quality of evidence","Technologies":"Improved study design and data analysis techniques","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Poor study quality in meta-analyses results","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable conclusions about the association between greenspace exposure and health benefits","Mitigation":"Invest in higher quality research methods and data collection","Technologies":"Advanced research methodologies and data collection tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Creation, regeneration, and maintenance of accessible greenspaces and street greenery","Impact":"Improvement in a wide range of health outcomes","Mitigation":"Invest in urban planning and green infrastructure development","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, green infrastructure technologies","People":"Urban planners, community leaders, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, local municipalities, community organizations"}]}
